name: Crazy Mad Stunt of City Car
name_original: Crazy Mad Stunt of City Car
description:
Crazy Mad Stunt of City Car

Are you ready for the most extreme real stunt game? Grand Race Auto Car Stunt City is one type of Simulation Game. Get set for loads of thrill and action!

Drive through treacherous hills and risky paths! The fantasy stunt city is full of challenges!
Different cars are available in this game like sports car, luxurious car, police car and many more!! Select your favorite cars. Grand Race Auto Car Stunt City is the best drive game. covering everything from Game Controls.
To prove your stunt skills come and play the challenging episode as a master!
There’s also too much high speed precision driving on display.
Models of a cars also includes a High Power Boosters. By Starting the booster The Cars are going to run in the rocket speed

Download this game for know more about this game..

Features:

- You will get the opportunity to have a choice of three different cars.
- Smooth and realistic car handling
- different Levels with various obstacles
- Overview about you stats
- 3 different controls and steer strength option
- Awesome sports cars
